metadata.title: Zi0n - Advanced Mobile Security
metadata.description: Transform your Android into an encrypted, secure, controlled and protected device with Zi0n.

hero.title: Transform your device with the
hero.description: Zi0n turns your Android into an encrypted, secure, controlled and protected device. It allows you to manage verified apps, system-specific security features to ensure privacy and advanced security.

security.title: Zi0n gives you more security
security.description: Exclusive features designed to protect your most sensitive information

wipi.title: Wipi Security
wipi.cardDescription: Deletes all device information when a suspicious cable is detected...
wipi.description: Wipi protects your device from manipulated data or charging cables. It detects suspicious connections, alerts the user, and depending on your settings, wipes the system to prevent any data extraction.

wipepin.title: WipPIN Security
wipepin.cardDescription: A PIN that instantly wipes all information when entered...
wipepin.description: A PIN that instantly wipes all device information when entered. A quick and discreet action to protect your data in critical situations.

wipsim.title: WipSIM Security
wipsim.cardDescription: Detects any unauthorized change to the SIM or eSIM...
wipsim.description: This feature detects any unauthorized change to the SIM or eSIM, and alerts the user with the ability to wipe the system to protect information.

wipconect.title: WipConect Security
wipconect.cardDescription: Link your Zi0n devices to other trusted systems...
wipconect.description: WipConect allows you to link your Zi0n devices to other trusted systems, managing (renewing licenses, locking or wiping other Zi0n systems) all devices connected to your account.

wipnoti.title: WipNoti Security
wipnoti.description: Zi0n can link with external apps to allow secure display of personalized notifications from conventional devices, without exposing the real system.

mdmApps.title: Connect more, protect more
mdmApps.description: Take your security to the next level with integrated apps

notifications.name: Push Notifications App
notifications.description: Receive real-time alerts about your device's security status and important system events.

wipe.name: Wipe and Lock App
wipe.description: Remote control to delete sensitive data or lock the device in case of loss or theft.

characteristics.title: How Zi0n's extreme security works
characteristics.description: Features designed to protect your information at all times

easyInstall.title: Easy installation
easyInstall.description: Scanning the QR code starts activation immediately, without lengthy processes or complex configurations. Completing activation takes only a few minutes.

globalService.title: Worldwide service
globalService.description: Includes encrypted international SIM cards to ensure stable access, using multiple operators to avoid interruptions and improve coverage.

noUpdates.title: Neither the app nor the system can receive push updates
noUpdates.description: Without automatic updates, no third party can force unauthorized changes that compromise the security of devices using Zi0n.

screenshotBlock.title: Screenshot blocking
screenshotBlock.description: Zi0n prevents screenshots or screen recordings, preventing sensitive information from being copied or shared without authorization.

inactivityWipe.title: Inactivity wipe
inactivityWipe.description: If the device exceeds the user-defined inactivity period, the system performs an automatic wipe to protect all information.

hiddenSystem.title: Facade Screen and Hidden System
hiddenSystem.description: Zi0n creates a rotating Android facade system and hides the real system inside an entry app. This allows you to mislead third parties, protect your privacy and stay safe.

disableMicCamera.title: Disable microphone and camera
disableMicCamera.description: Zi0n allows you to completely disable the microphone and camera in any part of the system or app, preventing any recording attempt or unauthorized access.

noServers.title: No accessible servers or data storage
noServers.description: Zi0n does not use servers with fixed locations and does not store device information, ensuring that no user data can be recovered or accessed by third parties.

dynamicVpn.title: Dynamic VPN with decentralized network
dynamicVpn.description: Zi0n uses an advanced dynamic VPN that operates on a decentralized network, constantly rotating the system's IP address to maximize privacy and hinder any tracking attempt.

permissionControl.title: App permission protection and control
permissionControl.description: Zi0n monitors and regulates the permissions of each app, preventing improper access and ensuring that only strictly necessary resources are used.

vulnerabilityAssessment.title: Vulnerability assessment and app classification
vulnerabilityAssessment.description: Analyzes each app for risks and classifies its security level, and deceives the app with false information to protect the Zi0n user.

smartwatchIntegration.title: Secure smartwatch integration
smartwatchIntegration.description: Zi0n can link with closed-system smart watches, allowing you to manage key system functions discreetly and securely directly from your smartwatch.
